tasks.label: Build debug API
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml build api

tasks.label: Run debug API
args: trap "docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml down api" EXIT; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml up -d api && docker logs -f illustrator-app-api-1
